channel.title: AI on Docker Docs
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Docker Docs

item.title: Build and run agentic AI applications with Docker
item.description: Learn how to create AI agent applications using Docker Model Runner, MCP Toolkit, and Docker Offload.

item.title: Face detection with TensorFlow.js
item.description: This guide explains how to run TensorFlow.js in Docker containers.

item.title: Build a language translation app
item.description: This guide demonstrates how to use Docker to deploy language translation models for NLP tasks.

item.title: Leveraging RAG in GenAI to teach new information
item.description: This guide explains setting up a GenAI stack with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Neo4j, covering key concepts, deployment steps, and a case study. It also includes troubleshooting tips for optimizing AI performance with real-time data.

item.title: Build a named entity recognition app
item.description: This guide explains how to containerize named entity recognition (NER) models using Docker.

item.title: PDF analysis and chat
item.description: Learn how to build a PDF bot for parsing PDF documents and generating responses using Docker and generative AI.

item.title: Build a RAG application using Ollama and Docker
item.description: This guide demonstrates how to use Docker to deploy Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) models with Ollama.

item.title: Build a sentiment analysis app
item.description: This guide demonstrates how to containerize sentiment analysis models using Docker.

item.title: Build a text recognition app
item.description: This guide details how to containerize text classification models using Docker.

item.title: Build a text summarization app
item.description: This guide shows how to containerize text summarization models with Docker.

item.title: GenAI video transcription and chat
item.description: Learn how to build and deploy a generative AI video analysis and transcription bot using Docker.
